description: From a series of 12 lithographs produced for Der Mantel (The Coat) by Nicolai Gogol, Kiepenheuer Verlag, Potsdam-Berlin, 1919; a man in a coffin leaning forward trying to touch his toes
inscription: LL in pencil, below image: 10) | LR of sheet, in pencil: Gogol : der Mantel / LL of sheet, in pencil: Sonderdruck. / E.64
portfolio: From Plate 10 from Der Mantel (The Coat), Nicolai Gogol, Kiepenheuer Verlag, Potsdam-Berlin, 1919
signed: BC in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté
title: Akaki in a Coffin Made of Spruce Wood, Plate 10 from Der Mantel (The Coat)
